page.title: 03THE POLICE STATION
page.content: Barkingside is the main division. J district is one of the biggest. J has four divisions: Loughton, Chigwell, Woodford and Chingford. Policemen only carry truncheons to protect them- selves. Guns are kept for serious crimes, and if they know that their enemies have weapons. They do a lot of football patrolling. Child cruelty is the worst thing P.C. Ryan has to deal with. An eighth of the force are detectives. Prisoners have escaped from Police cells in Ilford. A Discipline Code is a set of rules. Policemen are fined if they let prisoners go.
